Stories & Creative Works

Share your journey, creative works, and read real experiences from teens like you. Connect, find hope, and support each other.

Stories & Experiences

This is your safe space to share your mental health journey and read real experiences from other teens. Here, you can find hope, connection, and understanding through the power of shared stories and authentic experiences.

Personal Journeys

Real experiences with anxiety, depression, recovery, and growth

Support & Connection

Stories that help you feel less alone and more understood

Hope & Inspiration

Triumphs, breakthroughs, and moments of resilience

Remember: Every story matters. Your voice has the power to help others feel seen, heard, and less alone in their journey.

Popular Keywords:

anxiety depression friendship family school stress self care therapy recovery

Emotions & Feelings:

lonely overwhelmed hopeful grateful confused proud scared excited

Life Situations:

breakup moving graduation new school divorce bullying peer pressure identity sexuality

Community Guidelines

Your story will be automatically reviewed for appropriateness. Stories are approved if they:

  • Share personal mental health experiences respectfully
  • Use appropriate language and tone
  • Don't contain harmful content or explicit details
  • Focus on support, hope, and shared experiences

Creative Works Space

This is a special space where you can share your creative expressions and explore the artistic works of other teens. Whether you're an artist, writer, photographer, or just love to create, this is your place to showcase your talents and find inspiration.

Visual Arts

Paintings, drawings, digital art, photography, and crafts

Written Works

Poetry, essays, short stories, and creative writing

Other Creations

Music, videos, handmade items, and unique projects

Remember: This is a supportive space where creativity and self-expression are celebrated. Share your work with confidence!

Helpful Resources

Tools and support for your mental health journey

hotline

988 Suicide & Crisis Lifeline

Free, 24/7 support for people in crisis. Call or text 988 to speak with a trained crisis counselor.

Call 988
hotline

Crisis Text Line

Free, 24/7 support for people in crisis. Text HOME to 741741 to connect with a trained crisis counselor.

Text HOME to 741741
hotline

Teen Line

Free, confidential peer support for teens by teens. Call 1-800-TLC-TEEN (1-800-852-8336) or text TEEN to 839863.

Call 1-800-TLC-TEEN
article

Teen Mental Health First Aid

A comprehensive guide to understanding and supporting teen mental health.

Learn more
app

Headspace for Teens

Meditation and mindfulness app with content specifically designed for teenagers.

Learn more
app

Soluna

Mental health and wellness app designed for teens, offering mood tracking, coping strategies, and peer support.

Learn more
website

allcove

Integrated youth mental health centers providing drop-in support, peer support, and clinical services for teens and young adults.

Visit allcove.org
